Title: State of the Uterus
Writer: Jenji Kohan (created by), Merritt Tierce, Anthony Natoli (story editor), Merritt Tierce (staff writer)
Actors: Taylor Schilling, Natasha Lyonne, Uzo Aduba, Danielle Brooks
Plot: While Daddy deals with backlash, Badison plots revenge. Flaca finds a co-host for her radio show. Lorna discovers that pregnancy has its perks.
